title: The Fiend
content:
aling until your next turn. An undead target receives Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.

Conjure beam(s) of crackling energy.The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level and three beams at 11th level. Each beam is rolled separately.

Inflicts Friends (10)

Gain Advantage on Charisma Checks against a non-hostile creature.

9m Concentration

Create a spectral hand that can manipulate and interact with objects.
